definition: to eradicate pornography and illegal publications
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must

sentences.english: The joint efforts of different departments to sweep illegal porno publications have achieved great success.
sentences.chinese: 各部門聯合展開的掃黃打非活動成績斐然。

sentences.english: We will improve management of the culture market and steadfastly fight against pornography and illegal publications.
sentences.chinese: 加強文化市場管理，堅持開展“掃黃打非”。
